long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin not only allows you to search Google with a single click, but also gives you access to user reviews about a brand. You can enter how many results you want to see in Google searches, type in what you want to search for and access the information with one click. We also used the Trustedsitereview website to see user reviews about the brand.
